title: Hawrysh second after selection race
text:
Hawrysh second after selection race By: Uncredited Report Error 
Cassie Hawrysh of Brandon finished second on Friday in the first of four events in Calgary that will be used to pick Canada’s World Cup skeleton team. 
Hawrysh finished her two runs in 1:56.43, with Jane Channell just ahead of her in 1:55.95 and Mimi Rahneva just behind in 1:56.56. 
Three women will earn a spot on the World Cup team.
